prayer.title: 🕊️ Morning Prayer
prayer.parsha_theme: dreams, building from nothing, divine protection
prayer.modeh_ani: מודה אני לפניך — I gratefully thank You, living and eternal King, for returning my soul within me with compassion.
prayer.blessing: Blessed are You who has provided me with all I need — I lack nothing essential.
prayer.psalm: Psalm 16:8: "I have set the Lord always before me; He is at my right hand, I will not be shaken."
prayer.proverb: Proverbs 27:23: "Know well the condition of your flocks, and give attention to your herds."
prayer.intention: Give me courage to take the risks You've called me to take.
prayer.closing: Go in peace. Build with purpose. Return with gratitude.

family.title: 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 Family Focus
family.suggestion: Friday activity: Dance party in the living room with Jones — put on some Super Wings music and let him show you his moves. Jett will love watching!
family.conversationStarter: Ask Jillian: 'What book are you reading right now? Any good?' — genuine interest in her world.
family.weeklyGoal: Sunday Sweet Breakfast coming up — pancakes with the boys. Keep it simple, be present.
family.potencyAction: Give her space if she needs it, then come back with a genuine apology

relationshipStatus.note: ⚠️ Below 5:1 threshold. Focus on repair — acknowledge without defending.

family.reflection: The relationship is in repair mode. This isn't about grand gestures — it's about showing up, listening without fixing, and genuine presence. Valentine's Day is 8 days out. Make it count.
